thoughtsList.title: Gulp is the Business
thoughtsList.info: So I have just started using Gulp and within a few minutes realised I should have been using it for all my projects. The file that you can download below minifies JavaScript, CSS, Images and JSON, It also prefixes CSS for older browser versions as well as using Browser Sync for live updates. There are a number of packages that need to be installed using NPM and they can be seen at the top of the file. Bottom line Gulp is the Business.
